title: Alien Space and Star Fleet Battle Manuals Gamescience Zocchi
description:
The Classic and rare Star Fleet Battle Manual and Alien Space Battle Manual from Gamescience and Lou Zocchi.

The Advanced Star Fleet Battle Manual contains the rules compiled, edited and expanded by Bob Portnell , along with the counters and player sheets. I&#039;ve also included a few extra ship designs lifted from the Star Fleet Battle Manual Tribute Page .

The Alien Space Manual was transcribed by myself. In the process I cleaned up, edited and compiled the rules for clarity.

Enjoy.
